  2. Prayers By Type

Questions On The Occasion Of Worship

  • What did you do during worship today?
  • How was your meeting for worship? Why?
  • What did you think of the messages in worship?
  • Did you experience the presence of the divine? How did you know?
  • Did you yield to the leading of the spirit during meeting for worship? Why?

Author: Teen Affiliated Group at Strawberry Creek Friends Meeting

Sources: Teen Affiliated Group at Strawberry Creek Friends Meeting

Notes: The origenal quieries were "Were you obediant to the leadings of the spirit at meeting?"
